metadata.title: CVE-2024-27033 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: fix to remove unnecessary f2fs_bug_on() to avoid panicverify_blkaddr() will trigger panic once we inject fault intof2fs_is_valid_blkaddr(), fix to remove this unnecessary f2fs_bug_on().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
